it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.network.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.network.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all of the operation that the server does and his socket
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Server.MyTask
      Calls the method that starts the game at the end of the timer

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean anticipatedFrenzy
      It's true if the first player decides that at the end there will be the last turn in frenzy mode, false otherwise.

      The reference of the controller

      The delay after which start the game

      The list of the client connected
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listOfColor
      The list of the colors of the clients that participate to the game, in order of their connection
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listOfNickname
      The list of the nicknames of the clients that participate to the game, in order of their connection
      private java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket
      The server socket used to accept connection by clients
      private Server.MyTask task
      The task that starts after the delay
      private boolean terminatorMode
      It's true if the first player decides to play in terminator mode, false otherwise.
      private java.util.Timer timer
      The timer that starts when 3 client will connect to play
      private int typeMap
      The type of map chosen by the player to play with. 0 for default to be modified later automatically

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        private Server()
        throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor that creates an instance of the game, controller. Creates a server socket to receive connections and read from file the duration of delay, setting the timer with his task
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there would be problems with the file where reading the delay for the timer

    • Method Detail

                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts when the application running on the server side
        Parameters:
        argv - Classic main parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there will be some problem of creation of the server

      • run

        private void run()
        Handles the connections of the clients creating for each one a VirtualView in a separated thread

      • deregister

        void deregister(VirtualView view,
                java.net.Socket client)
        Removes in synchronized way a VirtualView from the list of virtual view in the game and a client from the list of his clients connected
        Parameters:
        view - The view to remove
        client - The client to remove

      • startGame

        private void startGame()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the game passing to it all of the information that it needs. Remain in listening for reconnection of players.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there will be problems with the reconnection.

        void setTypeMap(int typeMap,
                boolean defaultValue)
        Sets the type of map when the first player could not do that in accordance with the number of players.

        typeMap - The current type of map
        defaultValue - It's true if the value was not modified by the first client, false otherwise
